# Settings

## Dark Theme <a href="#dark-theme" id="dark-theme"></a>

1. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
2. Click **Settings**
3. Click switch button to enable or disable the dark theme

## Update Sync <a href="#update-sync" id="update-sync"></a>

Sync releases updates from time to time. Install the update version for feature, security fixes and improved software stability.Sync can automatically update when a new version is release.

### Check Update Manually <a href="#check-update-manually" id="check-update-manually"></a>

1. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
2. Click **Settings**
3. In **Auto Update** section, Click **CHECK** at the right side
4. If there is a new released, it will automatically download the latest version
5. When the download is completed , click **Quit and Install** to finish the update

### Sync Version <a href="#sync-version" id="sync-version"></a>

1. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
2. Click **About**

## Blockchain Explorer <a href="#blockchain-explorer" id="blockchain-explorer"></a>

1. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
2. Click **Settings**
3. In **Blockchain Explorer** section, Click **Drop-down list** at the right side.
4. Set **VeChain Explorer** / **Insight** as default

## Node Management <a href="#node-management" id="node-management"></a>

### Add Custom Node <a href="#add-custom-node" id="add-custom-node"></a>

1. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
2. Click **Settings**
3. Click **Add Node** on **Default Node** section
4. Input the name which can help you to identify the node
5. Input the URL
6. Wait for a while ,it will automatically identify the network name (MAIN/TEST/SOLO/UNKNOWN) and add the node to the list

{% hint style="info" %}
Get more information [how-to-run-a-thor-solo-node](../../../../developer-resources/tutorials/how-to-run-a-thor-solo-node/ "mention")
{% endhint %}

### Edit Custom Node's Name <a href="#edit-custom-node-s-name" id="edit-custom-node-s-name"></a>

1. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
2. Click **Settings**
3. Find the node you wish to edit
4. Click **EDIT**
5. Input the name which can help you to identify the node
6. Click **SAVE**

### Delete Custom Node <a href="#delete-custom-node" id="delete-custom-node"></a>

1. At top right, click <img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="" data-size="line">
2. Click **Settings**
3. Find the node you wish to delete
4. Click **EDIT**
5. Click **DELETE**

### Set Default Node <a href="#set-default-node" id="set-default-node"></a>

1. Move the pointer to the left side of the node's information
2. Click the circle to make it selected
